## transformRect() function

Calculate new rectangle after transforming the container

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function transformRect(
  containerSize: Size,
  rect: Rect,
  rotation: Rotation,
  scaleFactor: number
): {
  origin: {
    x: number;
    y: number;
  };
  size: {
    width: number;
    height: number;
  };
};
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                             | Description           |
| ------------- | -------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| containerSize | [Size](./models.size.md)         | size of the container |
| rect          | [Rect](./models.rect.md)         | the target rectangle  |
| rotation      | [Rotation](./models.rotation.md) | rotated angle         |
| scaleFactor   | number                           | factor of scaling     |

**Returns:**

{ origin: { x: number; y: number; }; size: { width: number; height: number; }; }

new rectangle after transformation
